de.keyboardsurfer.android.widget.crouton

Interface LifecycleCallback


  • public interface LifecycleCallback
    Provides callback methods on major lifecycle events of a Crouton.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDisplayed()
      Will be called when your Crouton has been displayed.
      void onRemoved()
      Will be called when your Crouton has been removed.
